long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find your qibla direction with online maps. Find qibla on satellite without app! This plugin automatically gets your location information and draws a line on the map between you and the Kaaba without sending it anywhere! It also allows you to see other parameters you need (magnetic field, etc.) with the help of iframe in English or Turkish with one click. You can access our websites with a single click!
